text: gyeolhonhal yeonlyeong-e ileulttaekkaji goadeul-eul bosalpidoe geudeul-i geonjeonhadago pandandoel ttaeneun geudeul-ui jaesan-eul dollyeojudoe geugeos-eul tamnaegeona geudeul-iseongjanghaneun geos-eul sigihaji malla geu bohojaga buyuhadamyeon geu goaui jaesan-eul mat-a jun daegaleul sagjehal geos-imyeo geu bohojaga gananhadamyeon hab danghan boholyoman gajil geos-ila ttohan geu jaesan-eul goa-ege dollyeo jul ttaeneunjeung-in-eul se-uljini jung-in-eun hananim man-eulo chungbunhanila
